main event: A civilian observer reported seeing four star-like lights in the sky in St Clair, Pennsylvania on July 14, 1966.
interesting points: The lights initially resembled aircraft lights before blinking and splitting into separate objects,One object traveled south and then turned east while blinking,The observer was able to watch the objects for about 5 minutes,No physical evidence or photographs were present,The observer had a keen interest in UFOs and previously reported the sighting to local authorities.
sighted object: four star-like lights in the sky
witness description: Civilian witnesses with interest in UFOs
